lines.text: Hey, there's something funny going on around here... I got it, you know Shemp said he was coming back to Earth to haunt us.
Ah let him come, I ain't afraid of that fat head.
[Shemp hits Larry in the stomach and the head]
Moe, why'd you hit me for?
That's what I was afraid of. Shemp's here! It's him! His ghost just hit me!
I sure hope the DePuysters will be impressed by our butler.
If you HAVE a butler after I'm done giving him the business.
Why would anybody want a fountain pen that writes under whipped cream?
Well a... a fella can be out in the desert where there's no water to write under, can't he?

[Shemp puts his hat and coat in Spiffingham's arms]
Uh oh, if someone's in here, then how come I can't see them? And if it ain't in here, then this hat and coat's out for a walk by itself.
Uncle Mortimer, let him hear this.

[Shemp's on fire]
Hey Larry! He's been smoking in bed again! Get the water and the axe!

[getting him out of bed]
You nitwit, you brainless idiot you!
